text:
I have a small doubt !
In this blog listing page
<https://www.helpscout.net/blog/>
The second/third item is a image linked to an event. (In this case the simple, Powerful....Magic). It is been placed randomly.  Can anyone suggest ideas on how to do this in our blog listing template ?
Looks like it's just javascript inserting the promo items after the nth-child of the posts
as i have check promo are in only for first page so, so you can add promo after page loaded using child selector using js
using javascreipt/jquery is the way to go on this!
There actually is a hidden `description` field in the tags api you can update through the api, but it is not defaultly used as the meta D on tag listing pages
interesting, didnt know that. Thanks William!
Yep! You can set it through the api, there is just no UI for it

Just posting this as it’s related to ideas. 

We think it’d be nice if there was a separate Ideas forum for developers. Whenever we post something it sits dead in the sea of marketers requesting smart content this smart content that. Only to get revived once every 8 months by one other dev going, yea this is a good idea! to disappear into obscurity.

<https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/C960Q64G4/p1533055466000187>
